response: Switch ki price type ke hisaab se alag hoti hai. Normal 2-pin switch 15-25 rupees, 3-pin switch 20-30 rupees, modular switch 40-80 rupees mein milta hai. Brand bhi farak karta hai.
Haan bilkul! Hamare paas different brands ke modular switches hain - Havells, Legrand, Anchor, Philips. White aur ivory color mein available hain. Price 40 se 150 rupees tak.
Wire ka rate size aur brand ke according hai. 1.5mm house wire 35-40 rupees per meter, 2.5mm wire 55-60 rupees per meter. Polycab, Havells, KEI ke wire achhe quality ke hain.

input: house wiring ke liye kya chahiye
response: House wiring ke liye chahiye: 1.5mm aur 2.5mm wire, switches, sockets, MCB, distribution board, earth wire, concealed box, pipe. Total estimate depends on room size. Ek room ke liye lagbhag 3000-5000 rupees.
Hamare paas different types ke bulbs hain: LED bulb (9W, 12W, 15W) - 80-150 rupees, CFL bulb - 120-200 rupees, tube light - 150-300 rupees. LED sabse energy efficient hai.
Ceiling fan ki price 2000 se 5000 rupees tak. Table fan 800-1500 rupees, exhaust fan 600-1200 rupees. Popular brands: Bajaj, Crompton, Havells, Orient. 2 saal warranty milti hai.

MCB matlab Miniature Circuit Breaker. Yeh electrical safety device hai jo overload ya short circuit se bachata hai. Single pole MCB 80-120 rupees, double pole 150-200 rupees. 6A, 10A, 16A, 20A, 25A, 32A rating mein milta hai.

Socket price type ke hisaab se: 2-pin socket 25-35 rupees, 3-pin socket 35-45 rupees, universal socket 60-80 rupees, modular socket 50-100 rupees. Safety socket with child protection bhi available hai.
Extension board different sizes mein hai: 4 socket board 200-300 rupees, 6 socket board 300-450 rupees, spike guard with fuse 400-600 rupees. Anchor, Goldmedal brands achhe hain.
Inverter battery price capacity ke hisaab se: 150AH battery 8000-12000 rupees, 180AH 10000-15000 rupees. Exide, Luminous, Amaron brands popular hain. 2-3 saal warranty.
Voltage stabilizer different ratings mein: 1KVA 2500-3500 rupees, 2KVA 3500-5000 rupees, 3KVA 4500-6500 rupees. AC, fridge, TV ke liye alag models. V-Guard, Microtek achhe brands.
Geyser element 1000W-2000W mein available. Price 300-800 rupees brand ke according. Bajaj, Venus, Racold ke elements milte hain. Copper aur SS dono type ke.
Water pump motor price HP ke according: 0.5HP 3000-4500 rupees, 1HP 4500-7000 rupees. Submersible pump aur centrifugal pump dono available. Crompton, Kirloskar, CRI brands.
Electrical tape different colors mein available: black, red, blue, green, yellow. Price 15-25 rupees per roll. PVC tape sabse common, flame retardant bhi hai.
Distribution board size ke hisaab se: 4-way board 150-250 rupees, 8-way 300-450 rupees, 12-way 450-650 rupees. Metal aur plastic dono available. Din rail aur MCB separate.
Conduit pipe 20mm aur 25mm mein common: 20mm pipe 18-22 rupees per meter, 25mm 25-30 rupees per meter. Rigid aur flexible dono type. White aur black color.
Doorbell different types: wired doorbell 200-500 rupees, wireless doorbell 300-800 rupees, video doorbell 2000-5000 rupees. Battery aur electric dono option.
Immersion rod (water heater) 1000W-2000W mein available. Price 150-400 rupees. ISI mark wala safe hai. Bajaj, Crompton ke achhe models hain.
Electric meter connection ke liye MSEB office jaana padta hai. New connection form, documents chahiye. Hamare paas meter box, MCB, wire material available hai connection ke liye.
Hamari shop morning 9 baje se evening 8 baje tak khuli rehti hai. Sunday ko 10 se 6 baje tak. Emergency mein phone kar sakte hain.
Warranty product ke hisaab se: electrical items pe 1-2 saal, fans pe 2 saal, motors pe 1 saal, batteries pe 2-3 saal. Bill rakhna zaroori hai warranty ke liye.
Haan bilkul! Hamare paas experienced electrician hai. Fan installation 200 rupees, geyser 300 rupees, complete house wiring rate according. Quality work guarantee.
Haan, hamare paas card payment machine hai. Credit card, debit card, UPI, PhonePe, Google Pay sab accept karte hain. Cash bhi chalega.
Haan, 2000 rupees se upar ke order pe free home delivery. Local area mein same day delivery. Heavy items ke liye truck arrangement kar dete hain.
Solar panel aur solar system available hai. 1KW system 50000-60000 rupees, 2KW 90000-100000 rupees. Subsidy bhi milti hai government se. Complete installation with warranty.
